name: Ecopetrol
description: Ecopetrol is Colombia's largest oil and gas company.Founded in 1951 and primarily government-owned, it plays a key role in Colombia's energy sector and is focused on sustainability and transitioning to cleaner energy.

name: Bancolombia
description: Bancolombia is one of Colombia's largest banks, offering services like savings, loans, and insurance. Founded in 1945, it has a strong digital presence and operates in several countries.

name: Satena
description: SATENA is a Colombian government-owned airline, founded in 1962, that provides domestic flights to remote and underserved regions, helping improve accessibility within the country.

name: Claro Colombia
address: Plaza Claro Carrera 68A No.24B-10 Torre 1 Bogotá - Colombia
description: Claro Colombia is a major telecommunications company offering mobile, internet, TV, and fixed-line services, known for its wide coverage and innovation. It is a subsidiary of América Móvil.

name: Grupo Nutresa
description: Grupo Nutresa is a Colombian multinational food company, founded in 1920, known for producing processed meats, chocolates, biscuits, and beverages, with a strong focus on quality, innovation, and sustainability.

name: Argos
description: Argos is a Colombian multinational company, founded in 1934, specializing in cement, concrete, and energy, with a focus on sustainability and innovation.

name: Grupo Aval
description: Grupo Aval is a major Colombian financial conglomerate, founded in 1994, owning several banks and offering banking, insurance, and investment services. It plays a key role in Colombia's financial sector.
